questions.question: What is the primary goal of sustainable architecture?
choices: To meet present needs without compromising future generations
To create the tallest buildings possible
questions.answer: To meet present needs without compromising future generations

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a key element of sustainable architecture?
What is vernacular architecture?
choices: Architecture that uses only modern materials
Building style using local materials and traditions specific to a region
Designs created by famous international architects
Structures built only for religious purposes
questions.answer: Building style using local materials and traditions specific to a region
